name: Foreclosed
overview: FORECLOSED is a narrative-driven action-adventure game set in a cyberpunk world full of adrenaline, suspense, and experimental enhancements. Follow the story of Evan Kapnos, a man who was fired from his job, had his identity taken and his brain implants and access to the city's block chain compromised. Now he needs to escape and get his identity and implants up for auction.
